inlineContent.text: This section contains additional modules for calling, room management, messaging, contacts, conversations, and search functionality.

abstract.text: Live streaming, co-guest, co-host, and battle management.
用于从状态中选择和缓存特定属性，支持基于 KeyPath 或自定义投影函数
UI components for live streaming and calling.
Camera, microphone, beauty, and audio effect management.
用于封装业务错误码和错误消息
定义从状态中提取特定值的映射接口
基于 Combine 框架的响应式状态管理容器，支持状态订阅和更新
用于异步操作的结果回调，成功返回 Void，失败返回 ErrorInfo
AtomicX Core SDK, providing complete features including login, live streaming, calling, messaging, and device management.
